title: IHCL's fully renovated Taj Mahal Hotel completes 45 years
description: After a 2018 public auction by the New Delhi Municipal Council (NDMC), Indian Hotels Company Limited (IHCL), backed by Tata Group, successfully retained Taj Mahal hotel, colloquially known as Taj Mansingh. IHCL invested nearly Rs 250 crore in the extensive renovation of the property. Despite higher lease rentals, the renovated hotel has restored previous levels of revenue and profits. The revamped Taj Mahal hotel features themed suites, luxury apartments, upgraded dining areas, and enhanced wellness facilities, aligning with evolving customer preferences.
